cast.name: 米歇尔·内格尔施耐德 Mieshelle Nagelschneider

this_title: Animal Planet: Must Love Cats Season 1
trans_title: 动物星球：为猫痴狂 第一季
introduction: Must Love Cats is a celebration of fascinating felines and the fascinating people who love them.From cats that saved their owners' lives to swanky cat-only hotels, the series spans the realm of all things "cat." It offers a potpourri of amazing feline stories, jam-packed with interesting factoids and trivia bits.The show is hosted by musician John Fulton, who combines his love for ditties with kitties. He is on a mission to prove to himself and the world that America is filled — north to south, east to west — with cat lovers, and is in fact a Cat-nation.
chinese_title: 动物星球：为猫痴狂 第一季
foreign_title: Animal Planet: Must Love Cats Season 1
